text: John Bohlinger, Jr. (born April 21, 1936) is an American businessman and politician who served as the 33rd Lieutenant Governor of Montana from 2005 to 2013. He unsuccessfully ran for the United States Senate in 2014. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Montana Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Bozeman, Montana
title: John Bohlinger
